main.name: Yazin Farook
main.description: I love solving problems that other people do not see. And I want to be able to solve challenging problems using technology
main.bio: I am a recent graduate from  Purdue university who majored in Computer Science. My two concentrations for my major were Machine Intelligence and Software Engineering. On top of my school work, I had been working part time as a Software Developer for the EEE department at my university and recently the software I have been working on got approved for an open source license.
main.contactmessage: Feel free to get in touch with me!

resume.skillmessage: Here you can create a short write-up of your skills to show off to employers

education.description:
• Concentrations: Machine intelligence, Software Engineering
 • BoilerCode | MiniMake | HelloWorld: Mentor + Instructor
 • University Residences: Treasurer
 • iOS Developers Club: Software Developer
 • EPICS Purdue: Software Developer, Community engagement award winner

work.title: Software Developer
work.description:
• Open-source licensing executed on developed software by Purdue Research Foundation (2020)
 • Develop full stack Python software that allows Critical Materials Institute (CMI) researchers (and others) to perform their own Techno-Economic Analysis (TEA) on preferred TRL stage.
• Study and implement machine learning methods and agent-based modelling to the statistical experimental design techniques in the CMI software.
• Collaborate with CMI scientists/engineers to conduct TEA on their technologies/processes.

work.title: Lead Instructor + Software Developer
work.description:
• Teach Computer Science Courses including Java, Python, C, C++ and Web-Dev programming.
 • Supervise curriculum planning meetings, faculty meetings and student wellness meetings. Use a wide range of technologies and creative teaching styles in order to engage students.
 • Develop iOS mobile application to streamline business and increase the organization’s efficiency.

work.title: Web Development Intern
work.description:
• Responsible to define and design solutions dealing with back-end software/programs such as Centos, Apache, MySQL (MariaDB), PHP and LAMP stack.
 • Made involvements in the front-end aspects of web-development such as HTML, CSS, Java-Script and graphic designs (Adobe Photoshop, Adobe Photoshop Illustrator).

projects.title: Unifyre
projects.category: Web platform for students to stay connected with others and up to date with events through the pandemic.

projects.title: Emotional Stocks
projects.category: Machine Learning project to analyze the emotion of tweeters sampling tweets with a particular stock ticker.

projects.title: Twistter LCYS
projects.category: Website that addresses desires for micro bloggers to filter their feeds to the topics they are interested in.

projects.title: Personal Linux Shell
projects.category: (MVP Only) A React and Meteor based chat University project.

testimonials.text: Sometimes the best memories are also the shortest ones.
Only through hardship do you find relief in comfort.
Sometimes you just got to hear the truth
